FileIO module

This module contains basic file io procs, such as creating directories and getting directory names etc.

Imports

error

Lets

git_repo_path: string = if existsEnv(environment_variable): getEnv(
    environment_variable, "") else:
  putEnv(environment_variable, default_git_repo_path)
  default_git_repo_path & "/"
install_json_file: string = git_repo_path & gitman_install_file

Procs

                          tags: [ReadDirEffect, WriteDirEffect, WriteIOEffect],
                          forbids: [].}

    ...raises: [IOError, ValueError, OSError],
    tags: [ReadDirEffect, WriteDirEffect, WriteIOEffect], forbids: [].}

    tags: [ReadDirEffect, WriteDirEffect, WriteIOEffect], forbids: [].}

    ...raises: [IOError, IOError, OSError, ValueError],
    tags: [ReadDirEffect, WriteIOEffect, ReadIOEffect], forbids: [].}
proc remove_git_dirs(dirs: seq[string]): ErrorStatus {....raises: [],
    tags: [WriteDirEffect, ReadDirEffect], forbids: [].}
Removes all directories and returns amount of successes and a sequence of failed directories
